content.body: right, but that's a non-normative note on top of the normative default. when the descriptor isn't default, it's supposed to be specified in its entirety, like https://tc39.es/ecma262/#sec-%throwtypeerror% etc

content.body: "Every other data property described in clauses 19 through 28 and in Annex B.2 has the attributes { [[Writable]]: true, [[Enumerable]]: false, [[Configurable]]: true } unless otherwise specified."
